ARSimplePoint3DFilter Class Reference

#import <ARSimplePoint3DFilter.h>

Inheritance diagram for ARSimplePoint3DFilter:

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

(id) - initWithFactory:

Detailed Description

This class is a wrapper around ARArrayFilter, so that ARPoint3D objects can be easily filtered, using the same type of filter with the same parameters for each coordinate.

Member Function Documentation

- (id) initWithFactory: (ARFilterFactory *)  aFactory  

Initialize a point filter.

Parameters:
aFactory the factory that should be used to create the filters for each coordinate of the point.
Returns:
the initialized filter.
